title: NBA unveils all 30 team courts for Emirates NBA Cup 2025 - NBA
full_text:
The Emirates NBA Cup 2025 tips off on Oct. 31 and will once again feature playing courts with a bold and distinctive style.

Jon Hartzell, NBA.com

Each team has a new custom court for Emirates NBA Cup 2025.

The NBA unveiled today all 30 floor designs for the third edition of the tournament, which tips off Oct. 31, with an 8-game slate on Prime Video and NBA League Pass.

Designed by artist Victor Solomon, the courts feature fully-painted gradient designs, personalized overlays for each team, and hidden details for the two previous NBA Cup champions, in addition to other unique features. Solomon also created the courts for last season’s tournament and collaborated with Tiffany & Co. to design the NBA Cup trophy.
